question: Write a letter to your professor outlining why you are not satisfied with their course.In your letter:– write the reasons why you are not satisfied with the course– request to change your course– indicate what course you want to take instead
text: I hope this letter finds you well. I am writing this letter to draw your attention to your criminal psychology course at Queensland University.

I am an undergraduate student of psychology and I happen to take your course as required by the department. However, I find some contents that were taught in the class are outdated, such as the impacts of online fraudulent.  Recent scientific evidence from Standford University reveal that online fraudulent not only causes huge financial loss to its victims, but also worsens their mental health.
May you add this information to the teaching materials? You may also want to conduct a holistic review of the course contents and make sure they are updated.

error_list.error_des: The word fraudulent doesn’t seem to fit this context. Consider replacing it with a different one.
The plural verb reveal does not appear to agree with the singular subject evidence. Consider changing the verb form for subject-verb agreement.
The verb causes does not seem to agree with the subject. Consider changing the verb form.
The comma before the conjunction but also appears to be unnecessary. Consider removing it.
